page.title: 17ATTITUDES
page.content: The people we interviewed said they liked Kislingbury very much.Many of the houses in Kislingbury are old but there are a some new ones being built.One man we interviewed told us that his house was built in {1705}but the oldest building in Kislingbury is the church which was built in {1219}. Kislingbury itself has changed alot since the seventies.There has been a new estate built, and therefore a change in the types of resident.Most of the people we interviewed said they did not want Kislingbury to get any bigger.We think that Kislingbury is a nice place to live. General concern is shown over{social {problems}such as vandalism and litter in the streets.The area has many resident associations which hold no legal power but encourage the upkeep of standards.
